question: Assuming today is May 10, which statement about rainfall (mm) is true for the past 14 days?

options.A: The amount of rainfall peaked at the beginning of the past 14 days.
options.B: There was more rainfall at the beginning than at the end of the past 14 days.
options.C: None of the days had lower than 40mm of rainfall.
options.D: The amount of rainfall peaked at the mid range of the past 14 days.

explanation: The days are reordered to show different peaks visually. Although it may seem rainfall peaked at the beginning, largest values happen around the middle, supporting option 'D'.
